name: Name

applyTo.name: Apply changes to
list: This & all related future recurring transactions

transactionDeleteWarning: The transaction will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
emptyListUpcoming: No transactions are planned for this period

deleteWarning.account: DANGER: This will permanently delete the entire Account and ALL TRANSACTIONS without the ability to restore. Are you sure?
deleteWarning.category: DANGER: This will permanently delete the entire Category and ALL TRANSACTIONS without the ability to restore. Are you sure?

bulkDeleteWarning: This will delete all selected transactions. Are you sure?
bulkPurgeWarning: DANGER: This will permanently delete all selected transactions. There will be no way to rollback. Are you sure?
bulkMoveWarning: Please be sure to select the right account and the right category type applicable to all selected transactions to avoid wrong currency conversion effects.
transferMessage: You are about to make a transfer from one currency to another. Please enter the right incoming amount to make sure the conversion rate is right.
incomeCategoryExplained: Income transactions increase the account balance.
expenseCategoryExplained: Expense transactions decrease the account balance.
profitCategoryExplained: For business, profit is similar to expense because its taking money out of business and thus decreasing the account balance. The Profit checkbox allows you to visually group this kind of expenses into separate blue columns.
notifyMeAlert: When the transaction date comes, a tiny little notification on the app icon will emerge and remind you to process (confirm) this transaction.

error.nonJsonTitle: Something's wrong with the API (api.php). Not a JSON response
error.nonJsonText: Please contact your hosting provider or admin who had been configuring Webasyst on your server

arrow.up: Going out of cash gap on

cashGapIn: Cash gap is expected in {inDays} days ({date})
cashGapOut: Going out of cash gap in {inDays} days ({date})
newContact: New contact with the specified name will be created. Use the CRM app to view and edit contact profile afterwards.
selectedContact: Transaction will be linked with the selected contractor
accountBalanceTransactionListHint: Account balance after the transaction has been processed
forecasted: Forecasted balance dynamic based on all planned future transactions
trashInfo: Deleted transactions are not counted in any cash flow and balance reports and are visible to the app admins only. Select one or more transactions to purge or restore.
restoreInfo: Editing is disabled for deleted transactions. Select this transaction and restore it first.
selfDestructLabel: Automatically delete this transaction when its planned date comes
selfDestructText: Useful when real transactions are imported in bulk from banks and spreadsheets, and this particular transaction must be treated as a planned one that needs to be replaced with the imported ones.
contactsWillSoon: Contacts with linked transactions will appear here soon.

checking.name: Checking
checking.message: real money that makes up the today’s overall balance in the account currency

virtual.name: Virtual
virtual.message: all accounting features are available within the account, but its transactions won’t affect the overall currency balance for today, while planned future transactions will still form the forecast

virtualWithForecast.name: Sandbox
virtualWithForecast.message: all transactions are only visible within the account, making it possible to emulate any isolated financial scenario under this account
